alert.note: Alert for Allen; Barren; Warren (Kentucky) Issued by the National Weather Service

info.headline: Special Weather Statement issued August 12 at 12:00PM EDT by NWS Louisville
info.description: ...A STRONG THUNDERSTORM WILL IMPACT NORTHEASTERN ALLEN... SOUTHEASTERN WARREN AND BARREN COUNTIES THROUGH 1130 AM CDT... At 1055 AM CDT, Doppler radar was tracking a strong thunderstorm 10 miles southwest of Glasgow, moving east at 30 mph. HAZARD...Wind gusts up to 50 mph and half inch hail. SOURCE...Radar indicated. IMPACT...Gusty winds could knock down tree limbs and blow around unsecured objects. Minor hail damage to vegetation is possible. Locations impacted include... Glasgow, Eighty Eight, Red Cross, Pritchardsville, Haywood, Austin, Nobob, Settle, Yesse and Raley Ford. MAX HAIL SIZE...0.50 IN MAX WIND GUST...40 MPH
info.instruction: If outdoors, consider seeking shelter inside a building. Frequent cloud to ground lightning is occurring with this storm. Lightning can strike 10 miles away from a thunderstorm. Seek a safe shelter inside a building or vehicle.
